name: The Highest Degree of Human Wisdom
name_original: The Highest Degree of Human Wisdom
description:
What you're about to experience is an interactive and experimental narrative-driven Twine story.

Some of what you read will frustrate you, make you laugh, and what you choose may even bring you to tears. It's best enjoyed with headphones, and for a true understanding of the scale of this story you will have to play it more than once.

Whatever it is you decide to do, your choices mean everything and they mean nothing...
